column4: Hey guys, I have been trying to do a few things it /ect/ and i cant create new files or edit any files, can anyone help me with this please
use sudo or gksudo for graphical editors
but then how do i edit a file, lets say its /etc/iproute2/rt_tables?
how would i then create a new file in a dir?
why do you want two ISP's connected to your machine
My adsl is capped, so i have only 2gigs per month, so I want to use another line to download that big stuff and use my adsl to surf
i can get it to work in windows really well
iptables/quos traffic shaping is the only real way to manage that, that I'm aware of
well im really new here so i dont actually know how to do that stuff :s All the tutorials i have found use 2 eth connections
what software are you using in windows to manage your connection ?
how are you telling windows "if a file = 2meg of bigger go here, else go the other one"
i dont do that, what i do is, i route the other connection to a spacific IP, its actually a proxy server, then i just configure a download manager to download from that proxy only
do the same in liunux then
